name: Space Shuttle Simulator 3D Free
description:
Navigate a space shuttle through asteroid fields with this 3D simulator! Feel like an astronaut exploring the space. Enjoy amazing space views, control a shuttle, avoid asteroids and dock to the ISS! Start a cosmic flight being a pilot of a space shuttle! Try our new Space Shuttle Simulator 3D!

Be an astronaut and conquer space! Your goal as a pilot is to put a space shuttle into orbit, discard stages of your shuttle and reach the ISS! Enjoy this space simulator! Great game for those who dreamed to become a space shuttle pilot or even an astronaut! Face dangers being an astronaut and get the experience of flying on the infinity space! Improve your flight skills with this Space Shuttle Simulator 3D!

Space Shuttle Simulator 3D features:

- Be a pilot of a space shuttle!
- Realistic space flight physics
- Reach the ISS
- Amazing cosmic views
- Whole space to explore

Let's start this cosmic flight with our Space Shuttle Simulator 3D! Feel like an astronaut, control a shuttle, upgrade your flights skills and explore space! Driver a shuttle right to the ISS and feel like a pilot with this realistic Space Shuttle Simulator 3D! Enjoy being an astronaut!
